mapper.sql: CERTINST_ID certinstId, CERT_ID certId, UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, ATT_LINK_ID attLinkId, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, CERTINST_CODE certinstCode, CERTINST_NAME certinstName, ISSUE_DATE issueDate, TERM_START termStart, TERM_END termEnd, CA_INFO caInfo, CERT_OWNER certOwner, ISSUE_ORG_ID issueOrgId, TERM_NUM termNum, TERM_UNIT termUnit, FLXL flxl, APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, QUAL_LEVEL_ID qualLevelId, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, MEMO memo, MANAGEMENT_SCOPE managementScope, AUTH_CODE authCode, certinst_source certinstSource

${alias}.CERTINST_ID certinstId, ${alias}.CERT_ID certId, ${alias}.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, ${alias}.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, ${alias}.ATT_LINK_ID attLinkId, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.CERTINST_CODE certinstCode, ${alias}.CERTINST_NAME certinstName, ${alias}.ISSUE_DATE issueDate, ${alias}.TERM_START termStart, ${alias}.TERM_END termEnd, ${alias}.CA_INFO caInfo, ${alias}.CERT_OWNER certOwner, ${alias}.ISSUE_ORG_ID issueOrgId, ${alias}.TERM_NUM termNum, ${alias}.TERM_UNIT termUnit, ${alias}.FLXL flxl, ${alias}.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, ${alias}.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, ${alias}.QUAL_LEVEL_ID qualLevelId, ${alias}.MEMO memo, ${alias}.MANAGEMENT_SCOPE managementScope, ${alias}.AUTH_CODE authCode, ${alias}.certinst_source certinstSource
mapper.select:
select
,ooo.ORG_NAME issueOrgName from AEA_HI_CERTINST ahc left join opu_om_org ooo on ooo.ORG_ID=ahc.ISSUE_ORG_ID where CERTINST_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_HI_CERTINST (CERTINST_ID, CERT_ID, UNIT_INFO_ID, PROJ_INFO_ID, ATT_LINK_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, CERTINST_CODE, CERTINST_NAME, ISSUE_DATE, TERM_START, TERM_END, CA_INFO, CERT_OWNER, ISSUE_ORG_ID, TERM_NUM, TERM_UNIT, FLXL, APPLYINST_ID, LINKMAN_INFO_ID, QUAL_LEVEL_ID,ROOT_ORG_ID,MEMO,MANAGEMENT_SCOPE, AUTH_CODE, certinst_source) values (#{certinstId}, #{certId}, #{unitInfoId}, #{projInfoId}, #{attLinkId}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{certinstCode}, #{certinstName}, #{issueDate}, #{termStart}, #{termEnd}, #{caInfo}, #{certOwner}, #{issueOrgId}, #{termNum}, #{termUnit}, #{flxl}, #{applyinstId}, #{linkmanInfoId}, #{qualLevelId},#{rootOrgId},#{memo},#{managementScope}, #{authCode}, #{certinstSource})

insert into AEA_HI_CERTINST (CERTINST_ID, CERT_ID, UNIT_INFO_ID, PROJ_INFO_ID, ATT_LINK_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, CERTINST_CODE, CERTINST_NAME, ISSUE_DATE, TERM_START, TERM_END, CA_INFO, CERT_OWNER, ISSUE_ORG_ID, TERM_NUM, TERM_UNIT, FLXL, APPLYINST_ID, LINKMAN_INFO_ID, QUAL_LEVEL_ID,ROOT_ORG_ID,MEMO,MANAGEMENT_SCOPE, AUTH_CODE, certinst_source)
( SELECT #{item.certinstId}, #{item.certId}, #{item.unitInfoId}, #{item.projInfoId}, #{item.attLinkId}, #{item.creater}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.certinstCode}, #{item.certinstName}, #{item.issueDate}, #{item.termStart}, #{item.termEnd}, #{item.caInfo}, #{item.certOwner}, #{item.issueOrgId}, #{item.termNum}, #{item.termUnit}, #{item.flxl}, #{item.applyinstId}, #{item.linkmanInfoId}, #{item.qualLevelId},#{item.rootOrgId},#{item.memo},#{item.managementScope}, #{item.authCode}, #{certinstSource} FROM dual )
values
(#{item.certinstId}, #{item.certId}, #{item.unitInfoId}, #{item.projInfoId}, #{item.attLinkId}, #{item.creater}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.certinstCode}, #{item.certinstName}, #{item.issueDate}, #{item.termStart}, #{item.termEnd}, #{item.caInfo}, #{item.certOwner}, #{item.issueOrgId}, #{item.termNum}, #{item.termUnit}, #{item.flxl}, #{item.applyinstId}, #{item.linkmanInfoId}, #{item.qualLevelId},#{item.rootOrgId},#{item.memo},#{item.managementScope}, #{item.authCode}, #{certinstSource})
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_CERTINST
CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId},
CERT_ID = #{certId},
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
ATT_LINK_ID = #{attLinkId},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
CERTINST_CODE = #{certinstCode},
CERTINST_NAME = #{certinstName},
ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate},
TERM_START = #{termStart},
TERM_END = #{termEnd},
CA_INFO = #{caInfo},
CERT_OWNER = #{certOwner},
ISSUE_ORG_ID = #{issueOrgId},
TERM_NUM = #{termNum},
TERM_UNIT = #{termUnit},
FLXL = #{flxl},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId},
QUAL_LEVEL_ID = #{qualLevelId},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
MEMO = #{memo},
MANAGEMENT_SCOPE = #{managementScope},
AUTH_CODE = #{authCode},
certinst_source = #{certinstSource},
where CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId}
mapper.delete: delete from aea_hi_certinst WHERE CERTINST_ID IN #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ahc.CERTINST_ID certinstId, ahc.CERTINST_NAME certinstName, aiql.QUAL_LEVEL_NAME qualLevelName, (SELECT aui.APPLICANT FROM aea_unit_info aui WHERE aui.UNIT_INFO_ID = ahc.UNIT_INFO_ID) applicant, (SELECT aiq.QUAL_NAME FROM aea_im_qual aiq WHERE aiq.QUAL_ID = temp.QUAL_ID) qualName FROM aea_hi_certinst ahc LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual_level aiql on ahc.QUAL_LEVEL_ID = aiql.QUAL_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aicm.CERTINST_ID, MAX(aism.QUAL_ID) QUAL_ID FROM aea_im_certinst_major aicm, aea_im_service_major aism WHERE aicm.MAJOR_ID = aism.MAJOR_ID AND aicm.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aism.IS_DELETE = '0' GROUP BY aicm.CERTINST_ID) temp ON ahc.CERTINST_ID = temp.CERTINST_ID WHERE ahc.CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId}
mapper.sql: hicert.CERTINST_ID certinstId, hicert.CERT_ID certId, hicert.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, hicert.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, hicert.CREATER creater, hicert.CREATE_TIME createTime, hicert.MODIFIER modifier, hicert.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, hicert.CERTINST_CODE certinstCode, hicert.CERTINST_NAME certinstName, hicert.ISSUE_DATE issueDate, hicert.TERM_START termStart, hicert.TERM_END termEnd, hicert.CA_INFO caInfo, hicert.CERT_OWNER certOwner, hicert.ISSUE_ORG_ID issueOrgId, hicert.TERM_NUM termNum, hicert.TERM_UNIT termUnit, hicert.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, hicert.FLXL flxl, hicert.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, hicert.QUAL_LEVEL_ID qualLevelId, hicert.certinst_source certinstSource,
mapper.select:
select, serviceMajor.MAJOR_NAME, qualLevel.QUAL_LEVEL_NAME from aea_hi_certinst hicert LEFT JOIN aea_im_certinst_major cermajor on hicert.CERTINST_ID = cermajor.CERTINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_major serviceMajor on serviceMajor.MAJOR_ID = cermajor.MAJOR_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual qual on serviceMajor.QUAL_ID = qual.QUAL_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_qual serviceQual on serviceQual.QUAL_ID = qual.QUAL_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_major_qual majorQual on majorQual.MAJOR_ID = serviceMajor.MAJOR_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual_level qualLevel on majorQual.QUAL_LEVEL_ID = qualLevel.QUAL_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_unit_service aius on aius.SERVICE_ID = serviceQual.SERVICE_ID
where serviceQual.SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId} AND aius.UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId}

select distinct detail.DETAIL_ID detailId, detail.ATT_CODE attCode, detail.ATT_NAME attName, detail.ATT_SIZE attSize, detail.ATT_TYPE attType, detail.ATT_FORMAT attFormat, detail.SORT_NO sortNo, -- detail.IS_DB_STORE isDbStore, detail.ATT_PATH attPath, detail.IS_ENCRYPT isEncrypt, detail.MESSAGE_DIGEST messageDigest, detail.MEMO1 memo1, detail.MEMO2 memo2, detail.MEMO3 memo3, detail.MEMO4 memo4, detail.MEMO5 memo5, detail.MEMO6 memo6, detail.CREATER creater, detail.CREATE_TIME createTime, detail.MODIFIER modifier, detail.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, detail.ATT_DISK_NAME attDiskName, detail.ENCRYPT_CLASS encryptClass, -- detail.IS_RELATIVE isRelative, detail.DIR_ID dirId, detail.ORG_ID orgId from BSC_ATT_DETAIL detail, BSC_ATT_LINK link
detail.DETAIL_ID=link.DETAIL_ID
AND link.RECORD_ID in
#{recordId}
AND link.PK_NAME = #{pkName} AND link.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
AND ( detail.ATT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR detail.ATT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR link.TABLE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') )
order by detail.CREATE_TIME DESC

select
, qlevel.QUAL_LEVEL_NAME qualLevelName, qual.QUAL_NAME qualName from ( select * from aea_bus_certinst cer where cer.BUS_TABLE_NAME=#{busTableName} and cer.BUS_RECORD_ID = #{busRecordId} ) buscert LEFT JOIN aea_hi_certinst hiCert on hiCert.CERTINST_ID = buscert.CERTINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual_level qlevel on qlevel.QUAL_LEVEL_ID = hiCert.QUAL_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aicm.CERTINST_ID, MAX(aism.QUAL_ID) QUAL_ID FROM aea_im_certinst_major aicm, aea_im_service_major aism WHERE aicm.MAJOR_ID = aism.MAJOR_ID AND aicm.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aism.IS_DELETE = '0' GROUP BY aicm.CERTINST_ID) temp ON buscert.CERTINST_ID = temp.CERTINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual qual ON temp.QUAL_ID = qual.QUAL_ID

select
, ql.QUAL_LEVEL_NAME qualLevelName from aea_hi_certinst cer,aea_im_qual_level ql where ql.QUAL_LEVEL_ID = cer.QUAL_LEVEL_ID and cer.CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId}

select
,aui.APPLICANT applicant,ooo.ORG_NAME issueOrgName from aea_hi_certinst ahc left join aea_unit_info aui on aui.UNIT_INFO_ID=ahc.UNIT_INFO_ID left join opu_om_org ooo on ooo.ORG_ID=ahc.ISSUE_ORG_ID where ahc.CERTINST_ID in ( select ahii.CERTINST_ID from aea_hi_item_inoutinst ahii where ahii.ITEMINST_ID=#{iteminstId} )

select
, qlevel.QUAL_LEVEL_NAME qualLevelName, qual.QUAL_NAME qualName from ( select * from aea_bus_certinst cer where cer.BUS_TABLE_NAME="AEA_IM_UNIT_SERVICE" and cer.BUS_RECORD_ID = #{unitServiceId} ) buscert LEFT JOIN aea_hi_certinst hiCert on hiCert.CERTINST_ID = buscert.CERTINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual_level qlevel on qlevel.QUAL_LEVEL_ID = hiCert.QUAL_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_certinst_major cm on cm.CERTINST_ID = hiCert.CERTINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_major smajor on cm.MAJOR_ID = smajor.MAJOR_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_qual qual ON smajor.QUAL_ID = qual.QUAL_ID

select
,aui.APPLICANT applicant,ooo.ORG_NAME issueOrgName from aea_hi_certinst ahc left join aea_unit_info aui on aui.UNIT_INFO_ID=ahc.UNIT_INFO_ID left join opu_om_org ooo on ooo.ORG_ID=ahc.ISSUE_ORG_ID where ahc.CERTINST_ID in ( select ahii.CERTINST_ID from aea_hi_item_inoutinst ahii where ahii.ITEMINST_ID in #{iteminstId} )
